BuildSequenceFromDeltaValues(Int32, List<Int32>)

Builds a sequence using the difference sequence(delta x values). This method is similar to dx->x in OM and bach.dx2x in bach.

Transpose(List<Int32>, Int32, Boolean)

Transposes a line of pitches by sepecific pitch interval. This preserves the ordered pitch intervals in the line.
